meanings.definition: A small dish of food or a drink taken before a meal to stimulate one's appetite.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delicious appetizer of crispy calamari.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy sharing an appetizer with friends before our main course.
meanings.sent3: The appetizer was so tiny, it looked like a snack for a mouse!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the appetizer that whetted his appetite for more conversation.
meanings.sent5: The appetizer was like a flavorful teaser before the feast.

meanings.definition: Something that arouses a desire for more.
meanings.sent1: The intriguing movie trailer acted as an appetizer, making me eager to watch the film.
meanings.sent2: His success in the competition was just the appetizer for his future achievements.
meanings.sent3: The appetizer of the first chapter left me craving the rest of the book.
meanings.sent4: The appetizer of her talent on the piano hinted at the musical masterpiece to come.
meanings.sent5: The appetizer of the opening act set the stage for an unforgettable performance.
